languages.text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per round but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming damage is also increased by +5.

This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

languages.text: 使用者每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}可以额外攻击一次，但会承受{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（5）效果。此外，使用者受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5点。
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: 使用者每轮可以额外攻击一次，但会承受{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（5）效果。此外，使用者受到的所有伤害提高5点。

languages.text: Боевой стимулятор позволяет совершать дополнительную атаку каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, но при этом накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (5). Получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} также увеличивается на 5.
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Боевой стимулятор позволяет совершать дополнительную атаку каждый раунд, но при этом накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (5). Получаемый урон также увеличивается на 5.
Боевой стимулятор позволяет совершать дополнительную атаку каждый раунд, но при этом накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (5). Получаемый урон также увеличивается на 5.

languages.text: この戦闘刺激剤は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき追加の攻撃を与えるが、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}(5)が適用される。受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}も +5増加する。
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: この戦闘刺激剤は1ラウンドにつき追加の攻撃を与えるが、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}(5)が適用される。受けるダメージも全て +5増加する。

languages.text: Este estimulante de combate concede un ataque adicional por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, pero aplica {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (5). Además, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido aumenta en +5.
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Este estimulante de combate concede un ataque adicional por asalto, pero aplica {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (5). Además, todo el daño recibido aumenta en +5.

languages.text: Diese Kampf-Stimulans gewährt einen zusätzlichen Angriff pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, aber verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (5). Erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird außerdem um +5 erhöht.
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kampf-Stimulanz gewährt einen zusätzlichen Angriff pro Runde, aber verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (5). Jeglicher eingehende Schaden wird außerdem um +5 erhöht.

languages.text: Ce stimulant de combat confère une attaque supplémentaire par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, mais applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (5). Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis augmentent également de +5.
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Ce stimulant de combat confère une attaque supplémentaire par round mais applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (5). Tous les dégâts subis augmentent également de +5.

languages.text: Bu çatışma uyarıcısı, her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilave bir saldırı kazandırır ancak {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} (5) etkisi uygular. Ayrıca, gelen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlar{/g} +5 artar.
languages.original_text: This combat stimulant grants an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5). All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is also increased by +5.
